## Project 1: [Glioblastoma Multiforme (GBM) Market Analysis Repo](https://github.com/xl3214/m3_GBM_market.git)

This repository is for data cleaning, tidying, and analyzing data from Glioblastoma Multiforme (GBM) patients to understanding the structure of GBM market. The purpose of this project output is to facilitate a 30-minite discussion on the GBM market. Data provided by Michael Allen Company.

You can access the output of this project [Here](https://github.com/xl3214/m3_GBM_market/blob/a48e0971c2d24c84a469fdbc784a760061bf0ac5/m3_GBM_market.pdf).

## Project 3: [P8105 HW3 Repo](https://github.com/xl3214/p8105_hw3_xl3214.git)

This repository was part of my coursework assignment. It uses data “The Instacart Online Grocery Shopping Dataset 2017”, "Behavioral Risk Factors Surveillance System for Selected Metropolitan Area Risk Trends (SMART) for 2002-2010", and accelerometer data collected on 250 participants in the NHANES study, all of which accessed from [course file](https://p8105.com/homework_3.html). 

You can access the output of this project [Here](https://github.com/xl3214/p8105_hw3_xl3214/blob/0fe03059ee6bc7484104e43385796e9857c731fe/p8105_hw3_xl3214.md).

## Project 4: [P8105 HW2 Repo](https://github.com/xl3214/p8105_hw2_xl3214.git)

This repository was part of my coursework assignment. It uses data “FiveThirtyEight”, "Mr. Trash Wheel", and dataset collected in an observational study to understand the trajectory of Alzheimer’s disease (AD) biomarkers, all of which accessed from [course file](https://p8105.com/homework_2.html). 

You can access the output of this project [Here](https://github.com/xl3214/p8105_hw2_xl3214/blob/82c02a004d9c9654272fd01ef8424cf08aef26c1/p8105_hw2_xl3214.md).
